pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 25, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montr√©al, Quebec

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks, and participate in an armchair discussion with environmentalist Steven Guilbeault at the Nature Champions Summit. Minister of Environment and Climate Change Catherine McKenna, and Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Jonathan Wilkinson will be in attendance.

InterContinental Montreal
360, rue Saint-Antoine Ouest

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the main lobby no later than 10:15 a.m.

12:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of Intact Financial Corporation Charles Brindamour.

InterContinental Montreal
360, rue Saint-Antoine Ouest

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Director General of World Wildlife Fund International Marco Lambertini, and President and Chief Executive Officer of World Wildlife Fund Canada Megan Leslie.

InterContinental Montreal
360, rue Saint-Antoine Ouest

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of Conservation International M. Sanjayan, and Vice Chair of the Conservation International Board of Directors Harrison Ford.

InterContinental Montreal
360, rue Saint-Antoine Ouest

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
